Plot: Goblins, elves, fairies and imps, and their misadventures sparked by the battle over a powerful potion.
Title: Strange Magic
Writer: David Berenbaum (screenplay), Irene Mecchi (screenplay), Gary Rydstrom (screenplay), George Lucas (story by)
Actors: Alan Cumming, Evan Rachel Wood, Elijah Kelley, Meredith Anne Bull
tomatoConsensus: Like most modern animated movies, Strange Magic is lovely to look at; unfortunately, there isn't much going on beneath the surface.
